name: Pitch Signals
description:
Goal: Get as many hits as you can while you attempt to decipher the signals of the pitchers. Make sure you press the right key though, these configurations are out of control.

Controls: Follow the on-screen keyboard key prompts to select your batting stance.

Some Rules: After a pitcher switches out, your strike count is decreased by 1. 

---Credits---
Co-created by: Evan Thompson
"Strike" and "You’re Out" sound effects by Mike Koenig
